name: bb-better-binding
description: 1 way data binding from javascript controller to html template

scripts.dev: nodemon --watch dev --watch src -e html,js --exec npm run build-dev & http-server ./build -o -a localhost -c-1
scripts.dev-live: nodemon --watch liveExample --watch src -e html,js --exec npm run build-live-example & http-server ./build -o -a localhost -c-1
scripts.dev-example: nodemon --watch example --watch src -e html,js --exec npm run build-example & http-server ./build -o -a localhost -c-1
scripts.build-dev: [ -d build ] && rm -r build; mkdir build; cp dev/index.html build; browserify -t brfs --debug dev/controller.js -o build/controller.js; cp favicon.ico build
scripts.build-live-example: [ -d build ] && rm -r build; mkdir build; cp liveExample/index.html build; browserify -t brfs --debug liveExample/controller.js -o build/controller.js; cp favicon.ico build
scripts.build-example: [ -d build ] && rm -r build; mkdir build; cp example/index.html build; browserify -t brfs --debug example/controller.js -o build/controller.js; cp favicon.ico build
scripts.build-docs: [ -d docs ] && rm -r docs; npm run build-live-example && cp -r build docs
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: mahhov
